recipes.title: Vegetable Beef Soup
ingredients: 2 lb bag frozen mixed vegetables (corn, green beans, carrots)
Seasonings: salt, pepper, garlic powder, Italian seasoning
directions: Put ground beef into a pot and cover with water.
While beef cooks, chop onion and add onion, celery, carrots, and seasonings (about 1 Tbsp salt, 1 tsp pepper, garlic powder, Italian seasoning).
As beef browns, add more water to keep ingredients covered and simmer until vegetables soften.
Remove celery and carrots to cool (discard if you do not want to chop them back into the soup).
Add frozen mixed vegetables, tomato paste, and beef broth.
If ingredients are not submerged, add more water.
Bring to a light boil, then simmer for 1–2 hours (longer simmer increases flavor).
